title: BEAUTIFUL NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS / DR. MARCO PARET'S STUDENTS
description:
In this video, Dr. Paret's students will show us the powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques that they learned in his masterclass. His student Rosa is doing magnetic passes on another student. Magnetic Passes are a non-verbal hypnosis technique, in which the hypnotherapist does hand movements near the body, without touching it. Dr. Paret will share more secrets about non-verbal hypnosis. Learn all of these powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info 

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
